description:
Smelling the wood of the Tachiwarai Tree makes anyone smile a little. Bonobono, Chipmunk, Raccoon and Badger take some Tachiwarai Tree bark and make a new game called "divine punishment" to relieve some of their pent up resentment by making others smell it. Dad, Big Sis, Fishing Cat... they attack many friends throughout the forest.
Source: crunchyroll
